=====================


**Tender Announcement**

**Community Board Members for National Investigations**

**Bid Opportunity # 21120-23-4118867A**

**Issued By:**
Correctional Service Canada (CSC)

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-08
**Bid Closing Date:** 2023-10-31T14:00:00


**Overview:**

Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of community board members to serve on Boards of Investigations (BOI) for national investigations. The CSC requires experienced professionals to provide independent and impartial oversight to investigate incidents related to offenders within correctional facilities and in the community.

**Key Details:**

* **Duration:** This opportunity is valid until December 31, 2024, with an option to renew for four (4) additional one-year periods.
* **Trade Agreement:** This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* **Competition:** This is an open bidding process, and all interested suppliers may submit a bid.
* **Indigenous Business:** This procurement is not subject to any set-aside for Indigenous suppliers.
* **Security Requirements:** This standing offer includes security requirements.

**Responsibilities:**

Selected candidates will be responsible for conducting thorough investigations, gathering evidence, and providing recommendations to the CSC. They must also maintain their independence and impartiality throughout the investigation process.

**Eligibility:**

Suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the solicitation document. A copy of the solicitation document, including the statement of work and evaluation criteria, can be downloaded from the Canada buys / tender opportunities website.

**Contact Information:**

Laurianne Ricard
Phone: (343) 553-4554
Email: [Laurianne.Ricard@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Laurianne.Ricard@csc-scc.gc.ca)  


**How to Submit a Bid:**

Bidders can download the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys / tender opportunities website. All documents must be submitted in either English or French.
